mapper.sql: p.id, p.title, p.content, p.user_id, p.section_id, p.view_count, p.reply_count, p.last_reply_time, p.last_reply_user_id, p.is_top, p.is_essence, p.status, p.create_time, p.update_time

p.id, p.title, p.content, p.user_id, p.section_id, p.view_count, p.reply_count, p.last_reply_time, p.last_reply_user_id, p.is_top, p.is_essence, p.status, p.create_time, p.update_time, u.username, u.nickname, u.avatar, s.name as section_name
mapper.select: select from post p left join user u on p.user_id = u.id left join section s on p.section_id = s.id where p.id = #{id} and p.status = 1

select from post p left join user u on p.user_id = u.id left join section s on p.section_id = s.id where p.section_id = #{sectionId} and p.status = 1 order by p.is_top desc, p.last_reply_time desc limit #{offset}, #{limit}
select from post p left join user u on p.user_id = u.id left join section s on p.section_id = s.id where p.user_id = #{userId} and p.status = 1 order by p.create_time desc limit #{offset}, #{limit}
select from post p left join user u on p.user_id = u.id left join section s on p.section_id = s.id where p.status = 1 order by p.is_top desc, p.last_reply_time desc limit #{offset}, #{limit}

select from post p left join user u on p.user_id = u.id left join section s on p.section_id = s.id where p.status = 1 and (p.is_top = 1 or p.is_essence = 1) order by p.is_top desc, p.last_reply_time desc limit #{limit}

select from post p left join user u on p.user_id = u.id left join section s on p.section_id = s.id where p.status = 1 and (p.title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or p.content like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')) order by p.is_top desc, p.last_reply_time desc limit #{offset}, #{limit}
select count(*) from post where status = 1
select count(*) from post where section_id = #{sectionId} and status = 1
select count(*) from post where user_id = #{userId} and status = 1
select count(*) from post where status = 1 and (title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or content like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
mapper.insert: insert into post (title, content, user_id, section_id, is_top, is_essence, status) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{userId}, #{sectionId}, #{isTop}, #{isEssence}, #{status})
mapper.update: update post set view_count = view_count + 1 where id = #{id}
update post set reply_count = (select count(*) from reply where post_id = #{postId} and status = 1) where id = #{postId}
mapper.delete: update post set status = 0 where id = #{id}
